label: AB2C3D2_tP32_127_g_eh_gk_k-001
title: Phosgenite [Pb$_{2}$Cl$_{2}$(CO$_{3}$)] Structure
comments: (Onotaro, 1934) made the first determination of the structure of phosgenite, \href{current_web_home_dir/AB2C3D2_tP16_90_c_f_ce_e-001}{which was given {\em Strukturbericht} designation $G7_{5}$ by (Gottfried)}. (Giuseppetti, 1974) and others found that the actual structure has a unit cell twice that of $G7_{5}$.  This newer structure is presented here.
